DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the number of prescribed units of a medication taken divided by the number of prescribed units of the medication that should have been taken by an individual as a percentage value (number of pills taken/number of pills that should have been taken, then multiplied by 100 to yield a percentage value)

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)_The bodily process of taking in and using up something, especially the eating or drinking of something._Patient Compliance is the extent to which the patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI):The bodily process of taking in and using up something, especially the eating or drinking of something.

Concepts.definition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.
The bodily process of taking in and using up something, especially the eating or drinking of something.

Property.preferredDefinition: Patient Compliance is the extent to which the patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations.

Concepts.definition: The extent to which a patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease._Patient Compliance is the extent to which the patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations._Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease.                           :Patient Compliance is the extent to which the patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations.:Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.
The extent to which a patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations.
A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated for Lombardi Cancer Center clinical trial
